title: Highest Service Imports in Communications and Computers
description: In 2023, 86.19% of Namibia's service imports were in communications, computers, and related services, indicating a strong focus on technology imports.

title: Highest Income Inequality
description: Namibia had a Gini index of 59.1 in 2015, one of the highest in the world, indicating significant income inequality.

title: Highest Income Share Held by the Richest 20%
description: In 2015, the richest 20% of Namibia's population held 63.7% of the country's income, highlighting a large disparity in income distribution.
